recipe.title: Sweet and Spicy Peanut Noodles
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon Asian chile paste (or to taste)
instructions: In a small saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and ginger; cook, stirring, until just soft, 1 minute. Add 3 tablespoons water, peanut butter, soy sauce, hoisin, sugar, vinegar and chile paste; cook, stirring often, until sauce is thick, about 4 minutes. Toss in noodles and scallions; serve at room temperature.
